World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest world news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/ 2024 年 2 月 24 日星期六 22:05:38 GMT 120
Germany still discussing supplying long-range weapons to Ukraine, foreign minister saysGerman Foreign Minister Annalena Baerbock, in Ukraine's Black Sea port of Odesa on Saturday, said Germany was still discussing whether to supply long-range weapons to Ukraine. Sat, 24 Feb 2024 21:31:08 GMT LQK32Q4JQNOFNHCICFRGRDBNVQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/germany-still-discussing-supplying-long-range-weapons-ukraine-foreign-minister-2024-02-24/Reuters世界欧洲
Western leaders in Kyiv, G7 pledge support for Ukraine on war anniversaryHeads of the Group of Seven major democracies on Saturday pledged to stand by war-weary Ukraine, and Western leaders traveled to Kyiv to show solidarity on the second anniversary of Russia's invasion, with no end in the sight to the fighting. Sat, 24 Feb 2024 20:00:45 GMT BM5K4COAGJPZBA2V7BWLG7WS2I https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/western-leaders-kyiv-g7-pledge-support-ukraine-war-anniversary-2024-02-24/Olena Harmash, Angelo Amante世界欧洲
Israel signals progress in Gaza truce talks, Palestinians see little movementIsraeli leaders planned to convene on Saturday to hear of possible progress in mediated negotiations on a new Gaza truce to recover hostages held by Hamas, but Palestinians saw little change in polarised positions almost five months into the war. Sat, 24 Feb 2024 18:51:12 GMT QRJUZ3VTE5PMNBF4FFRZDY6KLM https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israel-signals-progress-gaza-truce-talks-palestinians-see-little-movement-2024-02-24/Dan Williams, Nidal Al-Mughrabi世界中东
US military shoot down missile launched into Gulf of Aden, CENTCOM saysThe U.S. Central Command (CENTCOM) said that the USS Mason (DDG 87) on Saturday shot down one Anti-Ship Ballistic Missile launched into the Gulf of Aden from Houthi-controlled areas in Yemen that was likely targeting a fuel tanker. Sat, 24 Feb 2024 18:42:27 GMT 3MCGTJ5LO5LTHA24DO3AEEATTY https://www.reuters.com/world/us-military-shoot-down-missile-launched-into-gulf-aden-centcom-says-2024-02-24/Reuters世界
Pope accepts resignation of Polish cleric accused of ignoring abusePope Francis's representatives in Poland said on Saturday that he had accepted the resignation of an archbishop who was accused in a documentary of turning a blind eye to child abuse. Sat, 24 Feb 2024 17:24:59 GMT LYXA2STYGJN2ZI6WW3LF4OXI6A https://www.reuters.com/world/pope-accepts-resignation-polish-cleric-accused-ignoring-abuse-2024-02-24/Reuters世界
Stuttgart slip up with 1-1 against Cologne to stay thirdVfB Stuttgart were held to a 1-1 draw at home against Cologne on Saturday as they missed their chance to close in on Bayern Munich in second place in the Bundesliga. Sat, 24 Feb 2024 16:57:24 GMT 5K26MILEWNNEPBDELCSUES2GTE https://www.reuters.com/sports/soccer/stuttgart-slip-up-with-1-1-against-cologne-stay-third-2024-02-24/Reuters运动的足球
UK Conservatives suspend lawmaker who said Islamists control London's mayorBritain's Conservative Party suspended one of its lawmakers, Lee Anderson, on Saturday after he said the mayor of London, Sadiq Khan, was under the control of Islamists. Sat, 24 Feb 2024 16:55:04 GMT LBHV7S6JSFKYPPRRXR5SA767BU https://www.reuters.com/world/uk/uk-conservatives-suspend-lawmaker-who-said-islamists-control-londons-mayor-2024-02-24/David Milliken世界英国
Italy and Canada sign security deals with UkraineThe leaders of Canada and Italy signed security agreements with Ukraine on Saturday after talks with President Volodymyr Zelenskiy as Kyiv marked the second anniversary of Russia's full-scale invasion. Sat, 24 Feb 2024 16:50:21 GMT QEZLX3EVVVNJZPLAK4H66T7S6Q https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/italy-canada-sign-security-deals-with-ukraine-2024-02-24/Reuters世界欧洲
As Russia's invasion enters third year, Ukrainians shed tears of defianceUkrainians on Saturday laid flowers to honour their dead, wept, and hoped for victory despite the war's mounting toll, as they marked two years since a full-scale Russian invasion that shows no sign of letting up. Sat, 24 Feb 2024 16:12:47 GMT QTYU6XA33JK67G5A52ZPN2DFTI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukrainians-shed-tears-defiance-Russias-invasion-enters-third-year-2024-02-24/Andriy Perun, Ivan Lyubysh-Kirdey世界欧洲
Tunisian opposition figure sentenced to 6 months' jailA Tunisian court sentenced on Saturday prominent opposition figure Jawher Ben Mbarek to six months in prison after he criticised the 2022 parliamentary election, his lawyer and sister Dalila Ben Mbarek said. Sat, 24 Feb 2024 16:11:32 GMT OZGJJ37EVBISHJQBSB6CQC3PNQ https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/tunisian-opposition-figure-sentenced-6-months-jail-2024-02-24/Reuters世界非洲
Alexei Navalny's body handed over to his mother, spokeswoman saysThe body of Russian opposition leader Alexei Navalny, who died suddenly and unexpectedly in prison last week, has been handed over to his mother, his spokeswoman Kira Yarmysh wrote on the social media platform X on Saturday. Sat, 24 Feb 2024 15:43:45 GMT 5WYZ6IVPHBM4POCMOWWLPL2RSU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/alexei-navalnys-body-handed-over-his-mother-spokeswoman-says-2024-02-24/Reuters世界欧洲
